sentences.en: a law that first came into being in 1912
A skeleton staff of 20 is being kept on.
Doctors are complaining about being barraged by drug-company salesmen.
sentences.cn: 医生们抱怨他们疲于应付医药公司的销售人员。

sentences.en: He had a reputation for being bloody-minded and difficult.
sentences.cn: 他为人刻薄、难相处是出了名的。

sentences.en: He is being constantly monitored with regular checks on his blood pressure.
sentences.cn: 他被实时监测，定时量血压。

sentences.en: It shows a fox being disembowelled by a pack of hounds.
sentences.cn: 画面中一只狐狸正被一群猎狗撕咬得肠子外流。

sentences.en: Last night he was being held in solitary confinement in Douglas jail.
sentences.cn: 昨晚他被单独监禁在道格拉斯的监狱里。

sentences.en: Markov died after being struck by a poison dart.
sentences.cn: 马尔科夫身中毒镖而亡。

sentences.en: She did not take kindly to being offered advice.
sentences.cn: 她不喜欢别人给她提建议。

sentences.en: She had stopped nagging him about never being home.
sentences.cn: 她不再不停地指责他总不在家了。

sentences.en: The doctors gave numerous examples of patients being expelled from hospital.
sentences.cn: 医生们列举了大量病人被逐出医院的实例。

sentences.en: The exact locations are being kept secret for reasons of security.
sentences.cn: 确切地点因为安全原因要保密。

sentences.en: They get angry if they think they are being treated disrespectfully.
sentences.cn: 他们要是觉得受到了怠慢，就会大动肝火。

sentences.en: This will mean more remand prisoners being held in police cells.
sentences.cn: 这将意味着更多候审犯人会被拘押在警局拘留室。

sentences.en: We are constantly being reminded to cut down our fat intake.
sentences.cn: 不断有人提醒我们要减少脂肪的摄入量。

sentences.en: We usually think of a victim of mugging as being someone elderly.
sentences.cn: 我们通常以为被拦路抢劫的受害者是老年人。

phrases.tran_cn: 事实既然如此；情况就是这样

trans.tran_en: a living thing, especially a person

trans.tran_cn: （用于说明原因的非限定性从句中）因为
